nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"white\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"No Pain No Gain IV\",\"color\":\"light_purple\",\"bold\":true}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"You have \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"80% \",\"color\":\"yellow\"},{\"text\":\"chance to gain\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"10 \",\"color\":\"aqua\"},{\"text\":\"experience orbs every\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"time you take hits from mobs.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"You can only have 1 Ultimate\",\"color\":\"red\"}","{\"text\":\"Enchantment on an item!\",\"color\":\"red\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"I-V: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Dungeons\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Armor\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"COMMON\",\"color\":\"white\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"id":"ULTIMATE_NO_PAIN_NO_GAIN;4","enchantments":"{ultimate_no_pain_no_gain:4"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
